holding_back_on_serves.probleme: When to use a troublesome serve?
causes_communes: The opponent gets used to the serve

debutant: Use it early in the game to establish effectiveness
If not effective, stop using it; if effective, use it regularly

exercices_complementaires.description: Use the serve regularly in rotation with other serves and vary it to keep the opponent guessing.

metriques_progression: Win a game on the strength of one serve
erreurs_a_eviter: Holding back on a winning shot and hoping to come back
